keyMoments.title: Usopp and Chopper Defeat Baroque Works Officers
keyMoments.description: Two Straw Hat Pirates successfully defeat three Baroque Works agents (Mr. 4, Miss Merry Christmas, and Lassoo) through teamwork and strategy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even the crew's weaker members can overcome powerful enemies through intelligence and cooperation.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas Defeated
keyMoments.description: Two Baroque Works officer agents are eliminated from the Arabasta conflict by Usopp and Chopper.
keyMoments.significance: Reduces Baroque Works' active forces during the critical battle for Arabasta.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Gains Upper Hand Against Sanji
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei discovers and exploits Sanji's weakness, giving Baroque Works an advantage in their battle.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Baroque Works agents' tactical intelligence and adaptability in combat.
